metadata.name: HV-MTL #1
metadata.description: HV-MTL is a dynamic NFT collection consisting of mechs summoned through a space-time rift that has opened up outside the Bored Ape Yacht Club. Once unlocked, each Core transforms into a one-of-a-kind mech designed to evolve in the right environment. For unlock https://mdvmrn.xyz/unlock/?tokenId=1
